column4: I have windwos xp on my computer, if I install ubuntu can I resize the partition mounted for the xp os using a program on ubuntu?
I'd recommend only resizing from a live cd.  You can do it as root if your windows drive isn't mounted, but you can't resize the linux partition if it's being used.
you can use the live CD while resizing, however ... I'm not sure I recommend that either :)  Sure it'll work but I get scared of the idea of some other program jacking things up.
You should be able to surf the web in firefox while resizing but I just don't recommend it :)
